10 Biggest Mistakes Posting on Reddit as an OnlyFans Creator

The Reddit journey can be frustrating as you strive to pull in more fans.

15 OnlyFans Alternatives: Why OnlyFans is Still King

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 46 sec

Are you an established OnlyFans content creator thinking of raking in more income by exploring what other platforms have to offer? Well, that is a profound idea that this article will help you realize. If you are thinking of starting your content selling journey, keep a record of the listed platforms to explore right after working on your OnlyFans debut and growth journey. The alternatives include:

  1. Patreon 
  2. LoyalFans 
  3. Fanvue 
  4. Fansly 
  5. Fanso
  6. Fancentro
  7. Meet Your Model (MYM)
  8. iFans 
  9. Fantime 
  10. Okfans 
  11. AVN Stars 
  12. AdmireMe 
  13. Unlockd 
  14. JustForFans 
  15. Friendsonly 
Make an appointment now

Why Use OnlyFans as a Reference Point?

Launched in 2016; currently with more than 170 million users, OnlyFans is the de facto of content selling through a subscription-based model. 500,000 plus users sign up to OnlyFans daily leading to a 70% monthly growth. OnlyFans has more than 1.5 million creators receiving more than $5 billion yearly. This data undoubtedly proves that there is money to be made on OnlyFans. 

OnlyFans does offer you countable but very effective features that you get to use as a creator to increase your chances of making sales. It also offers you features to protect your content and monitor the success of your business. Therefore, using OnlyFans as a reference point helps to select an alternative platform that favors your OnlyFans business while earning you more income. 

Using OnlyFans as a reference point when selecting an alternative platform saves you time because most of the advantages you expect to receive as a creator are all within OnlyFans. Some of these OnlyFans advantages include:

 

  • The ability to co-stream. Networking in the content selling business space is critical. That is why OnlyFans made sure to allow you to collaborate easily with other creators. OnlyFans does this through a co-streaming feature embedded within their system. The feature allows you to go live with another creator. You are only required to schedule the time to go live and send an invite to your co-creator. Co-streaming helps the both of you appeal to a greater audience, boosting your credibility, authority, and gain more income.
  • The ability to create campaigns. OnlyFans has an inbuilt campaign feature you can utilize to implement various marketing funnels. For each marketing funnel you have created, OnlyFans provides you with a tracking URL (Universal Resource Locator) to monitor the number of clicks and subscribers each promotion campaign gets you. Being able to monitor your campaigns allows you to know whether your strategy is working or not giving you an easier time to make critical business decisions.
  • The ability to bookmark content. In case there are photos, videos, messages, or audio you want to revisit due to various reasons such as analyzing their performance, OnlyFans allows you to bookmark your content using the bookmark feature. Bookmarking saves you time when locating previous content. You can also bookmark other creators’ content for future viewing and learning from their content creation strategies.
  • The ability to schedule posts. With OnlyFans, you do not need to get a social media management tool for scheduling. OnlyFans has a scheduling feature you can use to create a queue of posts. This feature enables you to create a large pool of content at once and post based on your OnlyFans content creation schedule serving your audience better and allowing you to earn more income. 
  • The ability to view and monitor statistics. Running your OnlyFans business is much easier because you have an inbuilt tool that analyzes and monitors your data giving you insights that power your decision making. Through OnlyFans statistics page, you can view where most of your audience hails from, monitor your sales including past sales, and more.  
  • The ability to quiz your audience and create polls. OnlyFans has a quizzing and polling feature. You can create quizzes coupled with answers to keep your audience engaged or evaluate their knowledge base on a specific topic. As a way to create a long-lasting bond and relationship with your audience, you can quiz your audience to know how best they know you. Moreover, you can create polls for different purposes such as asking your audience which kind of content they would love to see next. Polling generally allows you to interact better with your audience and involve them in your content selling journey. 
  • The ability to earn through different methods. OnlyFans takes a cut of 20% for every amount you earn on the platform. But you have several earning options backed by various features such as the pay-per-view, tipping, and stream gates feature. You have the liberty to choose which earning method to utilize. 
  • The ability to go live. OnlyFans allows you to stream videos to your loyal subscribers. While streaming, you can request for tips from the viewers. The OnlyFans live streaming feature records all your live streams automatically and uploads them to your feed so that other subscribers can view the content in case they missed the stream session. 
  • The ability to recognize your top fans. OnlyFans provides you with a feature that analyzes your interactions with your subscribers and ranks them based on the tips they give you, their reactions to your content, and more. Using this feature, you know who contributes the most to your OnlyFans success and appreciate them. Recognizing your top fans creates a stronger bond between you and them sustaining your OnlyFans business for an extended period. Using this feature, you can come up with monthly challenges to determine who among your subscribers appreciates your content more. Such challenges create a competitive touch among your subscribers leading to them willingly contributing more to view your content. 
  • The ability to share stories. OnlyFans provides you with a story feature that you can use to share posts for a maximum of 24 hours. The time limit aids you determine your most loyal subscribers based on the number of those that diligently view your story posts. 
  • The ability to archive your past content. Using the OnlyFans vault feature, you can create an archive of your previous videos, photos, and live streams. Having a backtrack of your past posts allows you to determine what strategy has been working for you and which one failed. You can also repost previous content for the new subscribers to have fun watching.   
  • The ability to have a spring store. With OnlyFans, you do not have to rely on a third-party store provider to sell your products to subscribers. You can create a spring store and sell products directly on OnlyFans to your subscribers. Some products you can sell to supplement your OnlyFans gains include stickers, apparel, puzzles, and more. 
  • The ability to fundraise. When you want to pursue a specific course but lack the needed funds, you can persuade your subscribers to contribute to the course directly on OnlyFans. Fundraising on OnlyFans is possible due to the fundraising feature created within the platform. The feature allows you to notify your subscribers of any fundraising you would like them to be a part of and collect every penny they contribute.  
  • The ability to structure your audience. OnlyFans provides you with a listing feature so that you can categorize your subscribers based on various factors. This feature makes it easier for you to understand your audience, aiding you to serve them better.  
  • The ability to integrate other social media platforms and Spotify to your account. To expand your reach, OnlyFans allows you to reach out to more people by integrating your socials with your OnlyFans pages. You can also share links to your socials within your OnlyFans profiles. Additionally, you can enhance your relationship with subscribers by linking to your Spotify account so that they can listen to your playlists. Subscribers that share a similar playlist are bound to readily support your content because they feel connected to you through music. This connection earns you more on the fly without you having to put in much effort to promote your content. 
  • The ability to post both NSFW “not safe for work” and SFW “safe for work” content. OnlyFans does not discriminate against any creator’s choice of content niche. You can post nudity and non-adult content on the platform without getting your content flagged. OnlyFans only hosts users aged 18 and above. If you choose to create NSFW anonymously, OnlyFans allows you to create content without having to share your personal details and also provides you with a geo-location feature to control who can view your content. You can rest assured that your real details are less likely to be leaked due to the security features OnlyFans has implemented within their systems. 

OnlyFans offers you numerous merits because it would not exist without you as a creator. The merits enable you to create long lasting bonds with your subscribers, earn more, and keep your OnlyFans business going. Therefore, when selecting another alternative to OnlyFans, consider the advantages you get before selling your exclusive content through that platform. Here is a more expansive look into various OnlyFans alternatives and what you can get from selling your content through the platforms.

Make an appointment now

1. Patreon 

Patreon is a content selling platform that allows you to sell content using a subscription-based model. You are not allowed to sell NSFW content on the platform because they allow users aged 18 and below to use the platform. If you are thinking of selling NSFW content, you must flag it as 18 and above. Despite this, you are not allowed to sell porn on the platform. 

Patreon limits you to various features based on the package you subscribe to as a Patreon content creator. There is a lite package that takes a 5% cut from your content providing you with a hosting page, workshops, and communication tools. To access other features, you can either choose to pay an additional commission of 8% or 12%. Despite the lower commission rate, you can only cash out on a monthly basis. 

2. LoyalFans 

LoyalFans allows you to post all types of content, but, if you are posting NSFW content, you must mark it as sensitive. You can embed a logo within your profile. Having a logo makes it easier for you to brand your content-selling business. 

To be a part of the LoyalFans family, you must provide credible ID photos and sign an agreement. If you are planning to post NSFW content, you must indicate that when signing up. Once you have joined the platform, you can price your subscription from one US dollar to $50. Their subscription description is similar to that of OnlyFans. 

On LoyalFans, you can earn through subscriptions, going live, setting up video stores, their referral program, or from personal requests made by your beloved subscribers. You can price your content including photos, videos, text, and more up to about $500. It all depends on the value your content provides the viewers. 

LoyalFans pays its creators two times a month and you must attain a threshold of $50 before you can withdraw. If you do not achieve the threshold during either of the payment periods, you must wait for the following payment period to receive your pay if and only if you have earned more than $50. 

3. Fanvue 

Fanvue allows you to sell both adult and non-adult content. You can also sell your exclusive digital content as NFTs. NFTs referring to non-fungible tokens refers to transferrable digital assets exclusively owned by the creator and sold on the web. You can take advantage of this feature to earn more income. 

Fanvue makes it easier for you to earn by allowing you to include a promotional video within your profile. There is an earning calculator you can use to determine your potential earnings within the platform. Also, you can gain more income through paid posts, tips, re-subscription, pay-per-view content, and selling of custom content as per the request of your subscribers.

Fanvue charges you a 12% annual commission and afterwards charges you a 20% commission just like OnlyFans. You can also earn a 5% commission through their referral program for a lifetime for every new creator you direct to the platform. Despite the earning potential, you must attain a $20 threshold before you can withdraw your income. 

4. Fansly 

Fansly resembles OnlyFans when signing up. You sign up as a model and are supposed to wait for some hours for your account to be verified. Based on Fansly’s claims, you have the potential to earn more than $10,000 within their platform. 

You can create a free or premium page to earn your income on the platform. You can also receive more income by sending exclusive content to the free-tier subscribers through the direct message feature. You can also charge your subscribers a fee to remove the emojis you have placed on photos so that they can view the whole photo. 

On Fansly, you can earn through their referral bonuses but the platform takes a 20% cut for every earning you receive within the platform. Despite providing you with various earnings methods, you must attain a $20 threshold before you can claim your income. The same applies to OnlyFans. 

5. Fanso

Fanso does not embrace OnlyFans’ content selling business model; rather, Fanso allows you to own the whole business and commission out your business when you desire. The platform allows you to own a clone of OnlyFans with the potential of you commissioning a part of it to other creators. Fanso provides you with the source code of a platform similar to OnlyFans for a one-time price of $699. 

You have complete control of your content selling business once you decide to switch to using Fanso. It can be a great supplement to OnlyFans once you have a concrete following. With Fanso, you have unlimited live streaming minutes, a custom subscription feature, capability to sell content and earn tokens, and several other features. 

Fanso provides you with an eCommerce store you can tweak to your liking and sell your merchandise. You can also have a social community and stories resembling the Instagram stories look. Advantageously, the platform offers you a demo try of the features and operability before you make a sounder purchase. 

6. Fancentro 

Fancentro allows you to sell both adult and non-adult content through a subscription-based model. But you are not allowed to have any sexually explicit content on your profile. Other than that, Fancentro’s subscription plan allows you to control and define what you want your subscribers to access once they make a payment. You can either allow them access to your Fancentro feed, custom photos or videos, and your social media. 

You have seven levels of subscription pricing with the option ranging from a minimum to maximum charge. You can provide your prospective subscribers with free trials or discounts as an incentive for them to subscribe to your content. 

Fancentro charges you a 25% commission for every income you earn on the platform. The payout is after every two weeks. To boost your sales on the platform, you can use the Fancentro Directory to promote your work. 

Make an appointment now

 

7. Meet Your Model (MYM)

MYM is based on community building. This platform would favor you because it helps creators with an initial following to serve their fans better by organizing them into communities. Once you have created an account to host your community on MYM, you are allowed to set your preferred subscription plans. On the other hand, if you own a registered corporation, you can create a professional account. 

You have the option of providing publicly available content and setting some to private mode. The private mode feature allows you to keep your content behind a paywall. After locking your content behind a paywall, you have the option to earn through custom media sales, tips, subscription fees, push media sales, and more. MYM charges you a 25% charge from your total earnings and you must attain a 50 Euro threshold before you can withdraw your earnings. 

Generally, MYM promotes your account after posting more than 20 posts. You can also use the Push feature to turn your followers into subscribers even before hitting the 20-post mark. Fans have the liberty to request content from you. Content requests allow you to prove the worth of your content to your subscribers. 

8. iFans 

You can sell both NSFW and SFW content on iFans. The platform is known for its analytics features that allow you to monitor your performance. Additionally, it allows you to earn a 5% lifetime commission for every new creator you recommend to the platform. 

iFans treasure networking. You can earn more by recommending your subscribers to view other creators’ content and earn a commission. It is a feature known as share for share allowing creators to work together to earn more income from iFans. iFans charges you a 20% commission from your total earnings. To withdraw your income, you must earn a minimum of $20 from the platform. 

9. Fantime 

Fantime gives you a chance to own your personal website through which you can sell your content. You are provided with a domain and design tools to come up with your content selling platform. But, for every amount you make on the platform, you have to relinquish 20% of your earnings to Fantime. 

After setting up your website, you can sell content using a subscription model charging amounts ranging from five to fifty dollars. The platform pays you on a weekly basis and you must attain a $20 threshold before you can withdraw your income.

Fantime allows you to embed your socials within your website including Twitter. This move makes it easier for you to market your content. In case any of your content is leaked, you can report to Fantime’s Copyright Agents to resolve the breach issue. 

10. Okfans 

Okfans was initially known as Fan Page. It is a content selling platform that allows you to either provide free content to your subscribers or lock exclusive content behind a paywall. It also allows you to schedule your posts and to collaborate with other creators. 

Okfans charges you a 20% commission on the total earnings you generate within the platform. You can earn through messages, tips, subscriptions, and paid content. You can also live stream to your subscribers. Despite the earning potential, you must earn a total of $150 or more to withdraw your income. Additionally, you can earn a 5% commission from every referral you make.  

11. AVN Stars 

AVN Stars focuses mainly on the sale of adult content through various ways. You can provide your content for free or sell it by pricing it differently. All content sold through the platform must be marked as private to indicate to the user that they must pay to access the content. 

You have a greater chance of earning if you set up a video store within the platform. To thrive further, you can stream your content and sell the clips as posts. The platform takes a 20% cut from your earnings and pays you on a monthly basis. 

12. AdmireMe 

AdmireMe targets adult content creators who would love to start their content selling journey in a less competitive environment. The platform is relatively new; therefore, there is little to no competition. If you are starting out on OnlyFans, you might want to explore AdmireMe to expand your content selling business knowledge. 

Despite being small, AdmireMe has a search area compared to OnlyFans. This feature makes it easier for your content to be found. AdmireMe allows you to earn by directly selling your content and through other methods such as tipping. You will be charged a 20% commission on your total sales while using the platform and the payout is after every two weeks. 

13. Unlockd

Unlockd is known for its superb customer services. Compared to OnlyFans, you are likely to be served better by Unlockd’s support personnel compared to OnlyFans’. This is a claim that has been observed by many Unlockd and OnlyFans users. 

Unlockd’s site is similar to OnlyFans’, only that it has some few differences mainly in terms of design. Most of the features you get on OnlyFans are readily available on Unlockd. Users subscribe to view your content and can place a request for custom content. The platform charges a 15% commission but requires you to attain a $100 threshold before you can withdraw your income. 

14. JustForFans 

JustForFans does not have several creators; thus, it is a great option when you are starting out your content creation journey alongside OnlyFans because you can learn much faster and still make sales. 

The platform works much like OnlyFans allowing you to lock your content behind a paywall and sell it through various methods including subscriptions and paid messages. JustForFans also allows you to stream and create camming-based content you can sell at a specified price. They charge you a 20% commission on your total earnings and pay you after every month. 

15. Friendsonly 

Friendsonly is another content selling platform that focuses on adult content. You can sell your content through subscriptions, pay-per-view messaging, or through personally requested content. The platform charges you a 20% commission and requires that you request payment and wait for about 5 days for them to credit your account. 

The platform’s registration process is straightforward as long as you are 18 and above and can prove it. You are required to post vertical oriented videos like those on TikTok. Some creators say that having to post vertically disadvantages them, but Friendsonly provides its creators incentives such as gifting their creators to boost their content creation juices and morale.  

Conclusion

OnlyFans is king in the content selling arena mostly due to it having started the venture earlier enough and gained much traction compared to the many other platforms. Despite the controversies surrounding the platform, it provides you with numerous opportunities such as not having to worry about the type of content you post on the platform. 

As an OnlyFans creator wanting to earn more from the other alternatives mentioned in this article, compare what the other platforms have to offer from the advantages OnlyFans offers you. This article outlines all the advantages you enjoy as a beginner or expert OnlyFans creator. The merits are exhaustive and cover various aspects of content selling including promotion, security, and communication. 

When deciding which platform to switch to, reference OnlyFans’ merits as clearly outlined in this article. The details provided for each alternative platform are selective based on other creators’ experiences. Therefore, before you settle on one, do further research. 

If you find it hard to break into OnlyFans platform’s market, consult with Fandafia’s team of experts. They have a solid OnlyFans understanding and are ready to help you make an effective decision. Book your appointment today !
